div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxviijo die mensis
maij anno Domini et cetera lxxo nono

Quo die Duncanus leis per concessionem
propriam adiudicatur in amerciamento pro perturbio mariote cristy et emendabit et cetera

Eodem die In curia Dauid hil accusatus pro iniusta perturbacione Johannis
stewart negavit et conuictus fuit per assisam de iniusta perturbacione dicti
Johannis in verbo / et ideo adiudicatur in amerciamento et tenetur emendare eidem

Item mariota cristy in amerciamento pro iniusta perturbacione Duncanj leis prout de
liberatum fuit per assisam et tenetur emendare ad visum proborum virorum

The xxix dai of the moneth of maij forsaid / It wes determynit and de
liuerit be certane persons chosin and sworne in ane assise in the action' movit
be William blindsel yungar agane thom chepman as merchand til
him in that part of certane quhite clath / that gif the said thomas wald swere
that he brocht of buyrd in the litil carvil of Johne fichetis viij bar
rellis of meil / and that the lave wes redy tolay on buyrd to the quanti
te of the remanand of the said Williamis lastage / he suld be quyte
of the said Williamis clame / of the quhilk the said thomas made
ane aith eftir the fourm of the said deliuerence et cetera

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio coram preposito et ballivis eiusdem vij die
Junij anno et cetera lxxixo

Quo die subscripti electi fuerunt in assisam videlicet
Alexander chavmyr de murchil Johannes de Knollis andreas rede de bad
fothellis Dauid mathoson Andreas murra senior Robertus blindsel adam de
crafurde Dauid symson alexander hay thomas de marr' gilbertus vaus Johannes
vaus Johannes malisson Qui Jurati dicunt quod quondam Johannes edwardson pater
mathei edwardson latoris presencium obiit vltimo vestitus et sasitus ut de feodo ad
pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis de vna terra Jacente ad finem vici furcarum inter terram heredum
quondam Roberti de kil ex australi parte et terram andree murray ex boreali parte et communem viam re
giam versus oriens et occidens Et quod dictus matheus est legittimus et propinquior heres et cetera et legittime etatis Et quod valet
nunc per annuum xiij s' iiij d' et tantum tempore pacis / Et tenetur de Rege in libero burgagio et cetera Et nunc existit in
manibus ade andree per sasinam datam per Jacobum cuming tunc vnum ballivorum burgi de abirdene per spacium vnius annj
vel eocirca et cetera

The xviij dai off Junij the yer of god et cetera ix yeris
thomas schwnying mastir of a schip of tralsonde callit
cristopherus' hans' lut mastir of a schip of tralsonde callit
nycholas in the tolbuth of abirdene grantit thaim to be fulle
ly pait and content of all penneis and penny worthis
beir meill qweit ter and off all vdir gudis brocht be
thaim intharschippis to abirdene be the handis of Jhon' stewyn
sone' ane' of the balyeis of the said burgh and quhitcla
myis the saide burgh and merchandis and induellaris mer of
now and for euer

The samyn dai the Aldirman and the consale at the instance of our soueran lordis lettres my
lord of Abirdenis letteris and of maistir Alexander Inglis' chansler' of Abirdenis
lettres of Request has grantit and promittit til maistir Thomas strathach
in maistir of the grammar' sculis of Abirdene / that he sal haf yerly of
the common gude of this toune fyve pundis of the vsual payment of
scotland ay and quhil that he be promovit til a service within the kirk
of sanct Nicholes' of Abirdene / And that the aldirman that salbe for the
tyme sal ger him be content and payit tharof yerly / the said maistre
makand diligent and gude service for the informacion and Instruction
of the barnys at his gudely power' wirtin the vij day of June
the yer' forsaid et cetera

The xviij day off Junij the yer' of gode et cetera ix yeris
Mechaill schone' mastir of a crair of wismair hes cumyn'
in the tolbuth balyeis sittanande in Jugment grantit
hym to be fullely conte and pait of all his fracht and off
all vdir clamy at he hed to sai or to clame' of thome'
off mar pryncpaill merchande and all of the saide
schip to the said mastir and al vdir merchandis of the
burgis of abirdene ande he hes maide the said thomas
full procuratour for hyme to folow Will blynschill
and all vdiris at aw to hym' fraucht the said mastir
dischargis the said thomas and the towne' now and euer
mair of the said fraucht

The xviij day off Junij the yeir of god et cetera sewynty
ix yeris Robert blynscheill come in Jugment
befor the balyeis in ffensit cwrt in the our of caus'
befor none' and gert call Wat blynscheill ande
per offerit till hyme' as p he at is procuratour
to thome blynscheill and his ayris the some off
xx lib' for the redempcione' of that lande at
Wat blynscheill duellis in and the said Wat
hes deput his gude fadir in law patre badyenacht
and hes giffyn' full power as procuratour for hym
to answer to the said Robert as law will and princi
paly and in all that caus' and all vdir caus' be langand
to hyme' befor thir vitnes' Jhon' of Kyntor adam of cra
furde androw ratre filp of Dunbrek Duncan of stralocht
with d vdir diuersis et cetera

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio burgi de Abirdein xx primo die mensis
Junij Anno et cetera lxxix

quo die Johannes cultis Junior' receptus est in libe
rum burgensem et in confratrem gilde ex eo quod disponsauit filiam vnius burgensis ac
fratris gilde solito prestito Juramento

Eodem die Johannes malison' prosecutus est thomam symson pro iniusta detencione
duarum barellarum salmonum quo die dictus thomas vocatus ad instanciam dicti
Johannis non comparuit tanquam primo die huius processus quare precipitur seriando ad distrin
gendum dictum thoma pro amerciamento sue absencie et ad premuniendum ipsum thomam
ad comparendum isto die ad quindenam tanquam ad secundum diem huius processus et cetera

The xxv day of Junij thar' was chosin thir' personis apon' ane inquest of William'
blindseillis Thome of fiff Jhone Wormot gilbert of chawmer Adam of crafurd
William' the hay Dauid mathowsone Androw rattre Androw glodsmyth thome gardinar'
William' futhes' gilbert quhit Jhone lilburne Eduard' the hay Jhone Westland
Jhone traill gilbert scheref'

The xxviij day of Junij The yer' et cetera lxxix yeris It is ordinit and deliuerit be the
Aldirman and the consaill at war' present in that tyme' anent the clame' of wthir half prous'
stane' of wax clamyt be William' anffrasone' in the name' of mastir William' his brodir
that he sall remane' to the cumun hame' of William' goldsmyth it salbe delayt / gif he cumis
betuix this and lammes' nixt tocum and falyeand that he cum nocht hame' or lammes' Richarde of hill
salbe dettour' to the forsaid William' anfrasone' and till his brodir and sal pay thaim vthir' half
prous' stanis'stanes' overwrites 'prous'. of wax or ellis ij s' for ilke lib' of wax

The samyn' day It is ordinit and deliuerit be the Aldirman and the consaill that the deliuerans of
the inquisicion' belanging' a mark of annuall clamyt be Jhone' lilburne' of Jhone' chap
mannis lande is delayit to the hame' cuming of the aldirman fra the chakkar' and eftir his
hame' cuming fra the chakkar' he salbe seruit of ane' inquisicion' within thre or' four' dais
at the ferrast

The samyn' day the clame' of Duncane' talyour' agane' Jhone' of malison' of xlvj s' and viij d'
apon' the quhilk the said Duncane' strekit a borcht that wrangusly the said Jhone' held
the said sowme' fra him the consaill has deliueryt that the said Jhone' of malisone' sall ansuer'
till him this day viij dais that is for to say the v day of Julij as day peremptour'
The samyn' day

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio burgi de Abirdene quinto die Julij Anno et cetera
lxxixo

quo die Thomas symson' sepe vocatus ad instanciam Johannis malison pro iniusta
detencione duarum barellarum salmonum non comparuit quare precipitur ad istum diem tanquam ad
secundum diem huius processus quare precipitur seriando et cetera ad compellendum dictum Thomam
pro sua absencia ad comparendum in dicto pretorio ad quindenam tanquam ad tercium diem huius pro
cessus et cetera

The xij day of July the yer' et cetera abeowyn' writing' it is ordinit be
the haill consaill that all hambir' barellis out throw all the haill towne' sall be
Elik ondir a bande and a stande quhilk was mesuryt and prewit befor'
the consaill in the tolbutht / And gif ony barell beis funding les' of or
falty in ony thing' than is ordanit be the mesur' and bande salbe broking'
and put / away and the culpar that makis that falty barell and vnlauchtfull salbe
pwnyst tharfor' be the sicht of the aldirman and consaill

The xij day of Julij the yer' et cetera lxxix yeris It is ordinit / be the consaill that anent / the
complant' that Richarde boyll maid to the aldirman and the consaill tuiching' demynicion' and
lessing' that he has of his quartar than Wille yongar has Richarde boyll sall cheis' twa or
thre personis and Wille yongar als mony and gif thar personis can apoynt and acord thaim it
suffice and gif thai can' nocht accorde thaim the aldirman sall tak thre or four' personis that /
likis him best and he sall mak the apoyntment and cler' end betuix thaim that thar' be
na debate in tym' tocum amang thaim for thar' tym' anent that matir

xxiijo die mensis Julij Anno et cetera lxxixo quo die Andreas collison' receptus fuit in
liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde causa consanguinitatis prepositi et soluit quadraginta solidos
ad fabricam sancti nicholaij prestito solito Juramento

The xxvij day of Julij the yer' et cetera lxxix Androw scherar' aldirman Alexander
chawmer of murchille William' cummyn' of cultar Robert blindseill Thomas
of fiff Alexander red Adam of crafurd and William' blindsell arbitouris and sountouris
chosing and suorne' in the caus' debatabill betuix Gilbert morison' on' that a part and
Dauid falconar' his gud brodir on' that othir part / the forsaid arbitouris findis and
deliueris that the said Dauid falconar' has fullely fulfillit and done' thar' deliuerans
in all thingis that thai chargit him to do

The samyn' day abeowyn' writing' the aldirman and the consaill has deliuerit that Will
Wmfrasone in the name and behalf of his brodir mastir William' sall tak for othir
half prous' stane' of wax siclyk penny worthis be the secht of suorne prisaris
as Richard of hill or his son' in his name takis fra William' goldsmyth
nocht ganestanding' ony othir actis maid thar apon' of befor'

Penultimo die mensis Julij Anno et cetera lxxixo Jacobus lesly de pelcapill
filius quondam domini Willelmj lesly militis receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem
gilde racione libertatis sue patris prestito solito Juramento et soluit quinque solidos in
alba bursa preposito et cetera edificabit sufficiens tenementum in eodem burgo
infra annum et diem distringibilem pro regio annuo redditu et cetera plegio Dauid collisone bu
gense burgense dicti burgi

the xviij day of August the yer' of god A thousand four' hundreth' sewinty
and nyne yeris Mariory traill douthir of vmquhill Dauid traill burges of
Abirdene and ayr to A lande liande in the gallougat betuix the landis of William
blynsell one the northt half and Dauid colisone one the southt half and of twenty
schillingis wortht of annuall of Alexanderis of chavmeris landis in the schipraw
befor the bailye sittande in Jugement the gret Aitht suorne' be the saide Mariory
scho has frely gewin' and resignit the saide landis and annuall to Alexander rolland
hir spouse in mubil mariage and to the ayris to be gottin betuix hir' and the saide Alexander
and to the langast lywar' of thame twa Ande falyeing of the ayris gottin or tilbe
gottin betuix thame the forsaid and annuall sal redund and remayne to the saide
Alexander and his ayris lauchfull quhatsumeuere Ande heratour becaus' that James
trayll in aylseik maide Interrupcion brekand stac and possessione' at the saide
Alexander haide takin' obefor of the saide lande and annuall the forsaide Alexander and
Mariory protestit in Jugement that the saide brekin' of possession' sulde turne
thaim and thar ayris to na preiudice in tyme to cum

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per Alexandrum Rede vnum balliuorum eiusdem vltimo
die mensis Augusti anno Domini supradicto

Quo die Dauid meignes germanus alexandri menyes Inuenit Thomam de marr
plegium legalem pro eo quod dominus Willelmus Donaldi capellanus ac camerarius domini nostri
Episcopi Abirdonensis erit indempnis de ipso Dauid et parte sua aliter quam per viam Juris
Et eodem Alexander de camera de murchil deuenit plegius pro dicto domino Willelmo de indemp
nitate prefati Dauid meignes aliter quam Jura volunt

Item eodem die henricus bawne conuictus per assisam adiudicatur in amerciamento pro iniusta perturbacione
Johannis Irvyn in verbo Et similiter thomas bawne frater eius conuictus amerciatur pro eadem causa / et cetera
Insuper penes certa bona clamata per dictum Johannem Irvyne ordinatum fuit
per assisam quod dicta bona erunt deliberata Johanni Irvyn et ipse distribuet eadem bona
seu marcimonia artificibus sue artis huius burgi et cetera

The first dai of September the yer' of god M iiijc lxxxix It is ordanit
and deliuerit be the Aldirman consel and mony of the communite / that thar salbe a ham
burgh barrel made for salmond eftir the bande and stand ordanit this
yere / contenand xiij gallownis and thre quartis of wattir / quhilk barellis
salbe made eftir the mesure of a bande of yrne / that the aldir
man sal ger mak baith with girth vteu and ennew the barel
And al the barellis of this toune salbe made thareftir / And that al
cowparis sal cal the sercharis quhen the barellis ar made
that thai may be assayit with the samyn mesuris / and sa mony
that ar lauchful and sufficiant tobe torynt with the sercharis Irne /
And the serchearis fyndis ony barrellis vnlaufulle
the sersearis salhaf thaim til eschete / And the cowparis tobe
punyst be the avise of the aldirman and consale / And thir ar the sersearis
quhilkis ar sworn to minster that office lely and treuly coniunctlie
and seueraly / Androw scherar aldirman in the tym and Dauid colison bur
ges of Abirdene / And thir sercharis tobe continerit in the saide
office of serchary / alslang as thai do weil et cetera

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem iiijto die
mensis Septembris anno Domini supradicto

Quo die in Judicio comparens Thomas de murray nauta constituit
et ordinavit thomam de marr suum procuratorem et actorem Ad petendum et
recipiendum nomine ipsius constitutis ab Alexandro cowpar dimidium barelle sal
monum in qua eidem tenetur asteritus per concessionem suam propriam / ordinatum per
balliuos ad satisfaciendum dicto constituen' aut eius procuratori citra diem mercurie
proximo venturo

The x dai of September the yer' et cetera lxxix / the consel and diuers' persons
of the communite beand present for the tyme / has Remittit and owyr
gefin frely til Androw scherar' aldirman the Sowme that restis
in his handis of ony common gude of the tyme of his being in
office of aldirmanschip of tymis bigane before this yere /
wpon this condicion eftir folowand / that is tosay / he sal big
the beykins of the havyn ganandly and sufficiantly in al
gudely and possibil haist but delay / And he sal red the wrak
of in the havyn of the spanye barge that is beyond the wattir
within yere and dai at the ferrest The quhilk to fulfil he
has drawyn his land and gudis and the said aldirman tobe quyte
and dischargit of al clamys of det of the common gude aucht or
clamyt at him to this day / For the quhilk thai haf ordanit ane
letter tobe made vndir the Secret seil tobe gevin to the said androw sche
rar aldirman and tobe selit with the common clerkis hand / And thir ar the persons
that war present in the tym and consentit Alexander menyes Dauid menyes Alexander rede John of marr'
Alexander howison gilbert vaus John vaus David simson John Wormot Dauid mar Dauid hil alexander rolland Wat rolland
John stevinson ser Robert leis thom prat Wil moyses John knollis Wat achneif the fadir John
torryleth alexander trail thom mar thomas scrogis Jamis robertson Donald gariach and vthir sindry

The samyn dai the aldirman and consale beand present for the tyme has set and
tomail lattin til Alexander rolland the custum of the tol that he had of be
fore and has continuit him in the samyn office with siclike fredomys commo
diteis proffitis and dewiteis as he had it of before tyme for the
termys of thre yeris fra mertymes nixt tocum fullely tobe complete
payand siclike mail as he did before / And this thai haf fauo
rably grantit til him becaus' of scathis and dampnage that he has
sustenit of thre yeris bigane of the said office et cetera

Heratour thir persons vndirwritin consentit to the Act aboue writin in al poyntis anent
the beiknys et cetera Johne of glenmalvine Ranald talyour Adam of crafurd
Donald strathachin William malisson Richard hil Robert blindsel thom of chamer
thom symson Wil of gariach / allan smyth John' symson Johne stewart Edmond
lowson Wil of tulidef Duncan talyour Dauid spens John' litstar of the greyn Johne
litstar of the gallowgate Johne of lundoris John' of buchan androw mare Johne of lam
bynton' Duncan lammynton' androw lammyntoune

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem xiijo die Septembris
anno Domini et cetera lxxixno

Quo die subscripti electi fuerunt et Jurati in auditores Compoti Alexandri
menyes de officio sue prepositure videlicet Andreas scherar prepositus modernus
Johannes de marr Alexander rede Dauid colison' gilbertus vaus Robertus
blindsel Dauid symson Johannes Wormot et Dauid mathouson'

The samyn day the aldirman consel and communite has grantit to Sande cowtis
for the mending of the causais and the guttaris of the toune and tohalde
al the gatis of the toune clene / that al man may haf honest and clene
passage throuch al the toune / of ilke fyre hous' a penny And of al
vthiris outeburgez and Inburgess' and Indwellaris havand chavmer or hous'
a penny tobe pait twyse in the yer' mertymes and witsonday / the tane
half of the toune / payand the tane half at mertymes / and the tothir
half / of the toune payand the tothir half at Witsonday /

Item the samyn dai the aldirman and consel has grantit til Alexander trail and thom
of marr' and thomas scrogis / fredome and licence tocast a dok and a lare
place to thar schip for sauftee of hir within the havyn quhar'
it ples' thaim tolay hir withoute scaith or dampniage of the havyn
and the wattiris

xiiijto die Septembris anno Domini et cetera lxxix In curia ballivorum / quondam Edwar
dus anglicus conuictus per assisam adiudicatur in tribus amerciamentis pro iniusta perturbacione
Egidij naute Cardny carnificis et cuiusdam hatmakar et emendabit
eisdem ad visum proborum virorum
Item dictus cardny in amerciamento per perturbio prefati edwardi in verbo et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvto die mensis
et annj predictorum

quo die Johannes vaus filius gilberti et Johannes ska accusa
ti pro iniusta perturbacione Johannis byrsto anglici sub noctis silencio
conuicti fuerunt per assisam proborum burgensium ad hoc Juratorum / quare ipsorum
quilibet adiudicatur in amerciamento curie et emendabunt parti lese ad visum proborum
virorum ut Jura volunt

Eodem die Andreas / patricius et Duncanus factores pilleorum conuicti
sunt per assisam pro iniusta perturbacione Johannis famuli Jacobi howison
quare quilibet eorum adiudicatur in amerciamento curie et tenentur emendare ad
visum proborum virorum

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per prepositum et ballivos eiusdem xviijo die
Septembris anno quo supra /

quo die subscripti electi fuerunt et Jurati in Inquisicionem videlicet
Thomas de fife Adam de crafurde Dauid Kintor Johannes Wormot Robertus de
Kyntor Alexander hay Willelmus blindsel senior Jacobus craik gilbertus leche Dauid
galichtly murthacus glenmalvin Edmundus hay alexander goldsmyth John gre
gory Johannes stewart Adam androson Qui Jurati dicunt quod quondam Dauid gray
frater thome gray latoris presencium obiit ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis
sed non vestitus et saisitus de aliquibus terris aut annuis redditibus infra dictum
burgum Et quod dictus thomas est legittimus et propinquior heres eiusdem quondam
Dauid fratris sui de vniuersis et singulis bonis hereditariis sibi
spectan' et pertinen' per decessum eiusdem Dauid quondam fratri suj / et quod est legittime etatis et cetera

The samyn dai it wes ordanit and deliuerit be certane arbitrouris and gevin
furth be Alexander rede ane of the saidis arbitrouris that Allan smytht salbring
a man vnsuspect in ilke hande on mononday nixt tocum and do gude fath
that the stedy that Wat cutlar had was nocht pawndit til him be allan smyth
na Allan aucht him na gude / this beand done / Allane salhaf the stedy
and falyeand tharof the stedy salbe John' stevynsonis

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem xxmo die Septembris
anno Domini et cetera lxxixno /

quo die quidam toischach pistor conuictus per assisam amerciatur
pro iniusta perturbacione matris Georgij de Dys' et emendabit ad visum proborum

Item georgius Dys mater eius et soror eius adiudicantur videlicet earum personarum
quelibet in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione prefati Toischach et
tenentur emendare eidem ad visum proborum virorum vnde ordinatum fuit per
assisam quod dictus georgius in parte emende pro lesione dicti toischach dabit
j li' cere ad missam sancti sanguinis

Margareta nevyson in amerciamento pro iniusta perturbacione mariorie ettale prout
compertum fuit per assisam et tenetur emendare parti lese vt Jura volunt

the samyn day / it wes decretit be the court / that the production of the ij
witnes' be Allan smyth eftir the tenor of the act before writin swerand
that thai wyst weil that the aith made be the said Allan wes leil and
trew / is of vail / and that the stedy aw tobe deliuerit til allan smyth

The xxij day of September the yer' of god et cetera lxxix yeris the Aldirman
counsale and mony of the communite that war present for the tyme has gran
tit til Alexander of chavmyr becaus' that he can nocht get his comptis of the
tym of the being of quhilum Robert of gillespy in the office of common clerk
schip / that he salbe free and dischargit of thai comptis For the quhilk
he sal fynde a mason' to the biging of the qvere of Sanct Nicholes
kirk / for twa yeris nixt tocum / and for the cost of the mason and vthir costis
that he is / oblist tomak wpon the biging of the said qveyr / he sal
expend within the saidis twa yeris fourty pundis of his propir gudis
for the quhilk he salbe Releschit and remittit of al comptis bigane
anent his office of aldirmanschip except that he sal gif his comptis of
twa yeris of his being in office and except the gressome of the last
assedacion The quhilk tofulfil he has drawin his hand land and gudis

The samyn dai / Wille mathoson the second son' of quhilum Johne ma
thoson burges of this burgh comperit before the aldirman and certane persons
of the consale and as he that is of lauchful age and oute of tutory
has chosin Alexander rede his gude fadir tobe his lauchful curate
vntil his age of xxj yeris / this said curite havand ful power
todo and defend for him in al actionis and querellis belangand him his
land and gudis eftir the consuetude and lawis of burrowys / the said
Wille promittand tohald ferme and stabil vnreuocabli' quhat
sumevyr thing his said curate and procuratour in that part lachfully
ledis tobe done in his name / before thir witnes' Alexander menyes
Johne of Knollis thom fife thomas symson Wat rolland John'
the vaus' philp of Dunbrek and Duncan straloch twa of the seriandis
with vthiris sindry

Item thir ar the persons chosin and sworn auditouris of Alexander chavmeris comptis / John' of
Knollis David colison thom fif John' Wormot alexander rede Adam of crafurde

the xxiij day of September the yer' of god et cetera lxxix yeris before
